title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 142.3 - Certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 142.3 - Certification

State Regulations

In order to receive gifted and talented program aid, a
school district shall certify to the State Education Department, in a manner
prescribed by the commissioner, that it operates a program for gifted pupils
that is specifically designed to develop the gifted capabilities of these
pupils. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
142.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
